title: Gifting Bundles.
body:
Hi Fam...

So my brother is pretty amazing and one of his first ever favourite champions way way way back in season 3 was {{champion:99}}

This was the Season I got my brother into League, and I really wanted to suprise him by Gifting him the Master Edition Elementalist Lux Skin...
But Alas! As I threw money at my screen, I realised I could only gift him the standard skin package... which meant... I now have a lot of RP on my account.
I think you should make Bundles giftable.

Not only will you make more money, {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 
but also... people like me who want to surprise the people they love can do that with bundles too.
Bundles are very very cool. I really like the bundles, and infact sometimes, I'll save up money just to buy one of the current bundles for myself.

So... how about it?
Let's get Bundles into the Gifting section.

Thanks very much,
x

replies.body: coulda given them $40 and saved yourself the problem.
Nah I just Gifted him Fiddy of RP... but still... Bundles in Gifting is a no brainer.
